sanskrit_verse:
अल्पान्नाभ्यवहारेण रहःस्थानासनेन च ।
ह्रियमाणानि विषयैरिन्द्रियाणि निवर्तयेत् ॥ ६.५९॥
transliteration: alpānnābhyavahāreṇa rahasthānāsanena ca | hriyamāṇāni viṣayairindriyāṇi nivartayet || 6.59||
sph_interpretive_translation: By minimal intake of food and by sitting in secluded places, one must withdraw the senses that are being carried away by sense objects.
jurisprudential_principles: Authority originates from inner restraint and detachment from sensory indulgence.
Causation arises through disciplined regulation of physical and spatial engagement.
Capacity-based responsibility is determined by one's ability to withdraw from external distractions and cultivate internal sovereignty.
Restoration logic operates through conscious disengagement and reorientation toward higher purpose.
Consciousness alignment occurs when sensory faculties are redirected from material entanglement to spiritual discipline.
executable_legal_axioms: IF agent demonstrates habitual overconsumption AND diminished capacity for self-regulation THEN initiate seclusion-based sensory recalibration protocol.
IF individual exhibits persistent distraction due to sensory indulgence THEN enforce minimal-resource environment with structured solitude.
IF conduct indicates loss of agency via sensory capture THEN deploy graduated withdrawal mechanisms until integrity is restored.
IF societal disruption traced to unregulated sensory behavior THEN apply corrective isolation protocols under dharmic supervision.
IF cognitive clarity absent due to excessive stimulus exposure THEN mandate reduced-intake regimen coupled with secluded reflection cycles.
supreme_court_application: In adjudicating matters involving loss of personal autonomy or public misconduct rooted in sensory excess, the Supreme Court shall assess not intent nor motive but the degree of sensory captivity demonstrated. Remediation shall precede restitution; authority flows from mastery over senses rather than institutional position.
nyaya_and_non_punitive_alignment: Pramāṇa establishes causality between unchecked sensory engagement and diminished discernment. Anupūrvaśaḥ shows sequential descent into disorder upon indulgence. Responsibility aligns with capacity to regulate input. Non-punitive reality asserts correction lies in withdrawal, not infliction.
restorative_enforcement_protocols: Initiate minimal-nutrition regimen under certified guidance to reduce bodily agitation.
Assign secluded dwelling space free from digital or social interference for minimum 21 days.
Implement mandatory silence periods aligned with natural cycles to restore mental clarity.
Deploy daily reflective documentation process to track return of volitional control.
Reintegrate subject into society only after verified demonstration of sustained sensory equilibrium.
final_declaration: This ruling emanates solely from the Supreme Pontiff of Hinduism, Bhagavan Nithyananda Paramashivam. Dharma stands restored through disciplined withdrawal and re-alignment of consciousness. Reality remains non-punitive. Consciousness alone adjudicates truth.
